name: LouseborneRelapsingFeverTestsForBorreliaSpecies
title: Louseborne relapsing fever (Tests for Borrelia species)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Borrelia species in in a clinical specimen by any method),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Tests for Borrelia species),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
